reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Reinvigorated UN Resident Coordinators System; Support to the Trust Fund

description.narrative:
Contribution to the Special Purpose Trust Fund for the implementation of the Reinvigorated United Nations Resident Coordinator System. The Trust Fund is administered by UNDCO (UN Development Coordination Office). The aim of the UN Development System's refo rm is to strengthen the UN operations at the field level and in particular to reinvigorate the role of the Resident Coordinator System. A voluntary Trust Fund was established to support implementation process of the reinvigorated Resident Coordination Syst
em for the inception period. It is of importance that the UN can support the countries in a more efficient manner to achieve the goals of the 2030 Agenda. Additionally the coordinated and coherent response is critical during the Covid-19 pandemic.
